translated: Zheng He was born in 1371 and died in 1433 formerly known as Cheng Ho was a sailor, Muslim explorer, diplomat and fleet admiral during the period from the beginning of the Ming Dynasty in present China.
original: Zheng He né en 1371 et mort en 1433 anciennement appelé Cheng Ho était un marin, explorateur musulman, diplomate et amiral de flotte durant la période du début de la dynastie Ming dans l'actuelle République populaire de Chine.
